name: Stable Lightweight Three-axis Diesel Semi-trailers For Bulk Export To The Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation
desc: Category Aluminum Tanker Trailers   The three-axle diesel semi-trailer transporter will be exported in batches to the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation in Africa. The vehicle's overall dimensions (mm): 12200*2500*3850. The walking part of the semi-trailer is equipped with: 90# traction pin, 3-axle 13-ton Fuhua axle, 12R22.5 tire, 500L tool box, with ABS, two spare tire racks, reinforced mechanical suspension, single-acting outrigger, 8*16*100mm spring. Tank part: The tank volume is about 45m3 cubic meters, divided into three compartments, straight tank, the tank body is made of Q355B material, three European standard tank ports, three seabed valves, three bottom oil loading, with oil product display, independent ladder welded on the front of the tank body, movable European ladder with anti-skid plate, with aluminum alloy folding guardrail, anti-skid walkway installed in the middle of the top of the tank body, the front end of the barrel is fully welded with a drip hole connected to a small ball valve, and two 8 kg carbon steel fire extinguisher cylinders Delivery time: 15-25 days Tank volume: 40000L-45000L Application: Trailers can be used to transport various fuels such as gasoline, diesel, kerosene, etc.

name: Howo Cement Mixer Truck
desc: A powder tank truck, also known as a powder and granular material transport vehicle, is a special vehicle designed for transporting powdery and granular materials like cement, lime, and flour. It consists of a chassis, a sealed tank, an air pipeline system, etc. The 卸料 (unloading) is achieved by fluidizing the materials with compressed air. It features high loading/unloading efficiency, no need for packaging, large transportation capacity, and low loss, widely used in construction, chemical, agricultural and other fields.
specsText: A powder tank truck, also known as a powder and granular material transport vehicle, is a special vehicle designed for transporting powdery and granular materials like cement, lime, and flour. It consists of a chassis, a sealed tank, an air pipeline system, etc. The 卸料 (unloading) is achieved by fluidizing the materials with compressed air. It features high loading/unloading efficiency, no need for packaging, large transportation capacity, and low loss, widely used in construction, chemical, agricultural and other fields.

desc: The dead weight of Aluminum Tanker, Aluminum Tank Trailer is much lower than that of carbon steel tank trailers. The weight of a single transported cargo is 18%-35% more than that of carbon steel tanktrailers; Compared with carbon steel, aluminum alloy materials are more stable, corrosion-resistant, beautiful in appearance, and have a longer service life.
